author: AdrianoDee
body:
#### PR description:

Requires #39178

This PR adds the wfs to be used for BPH-TRK V0 reconstruction validation to the RelVal matrix.

#### PR validation:

Running wfs `11744.0`, `11745.0`, `11746.0`, `11747.0`, `11748.0`, ~`11749.0`~.
title: Adding V0 Validation Wfs to the RelVal Matrix
